description: This course about introducing Saudi Cuisine to the world. In this course, you will learn how to make three traditional dishes from Saudi Arabia. After taking the course, the student will understand what makes Saudi Cuisine special. The course is video base. The chef will give you a demonstration of how to make these dishes in a simple and easy way. The student will get a PDF file that explains the meaning of each dish with a list of ingredients. This course is 40 mins long including the readings. However, it is full of information and fun. The student will get extra benefits when they try the dishes at home and sent the photos to the Chef. So the chef can give an extra feedback on what may went wrong. This course simply for people who want to transfer their dining atmosphere to an Arabic one. Finally, the chef believes 99% that there are no other Saudi cooking Courses in English. So take this opportunity and be part of this course. (ARABIC SUBTITLE IS AVAIALBLE)
title: Saudi Cuisine
